briefTitle: MK0476 Study in Adult Patients With Acute Asthma (0476-322)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult Patients With Acute Asthma Attacks

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patient Has Any Known Or Suspected, Acute Or Chronic Cause For Their Pulmonary Symptoms Other Than Asthma (E.G., Copd, Chronic Heart Failure, Etc.)
* Patient Has A Smoking History (20 Cigarettes Per Day) Of More Than 15 Years
* Patient Has A Disease Of The Cardiovascular, Hepatic, Renal, Hematologic Systems, Or Other Severe Disease

outcomeMeasures.title: The Time-weighted Average of Change in Forced Expiratory Volume in One Second (FEV1)
outcomeMeasures.description: The Time Weighed Average Changes in Forced Expiratory Volume in One Second (FEV1) from pre-allocation baseline over the first 60 minutes after study drug administration with time interval between any measurement and the measurement prior to it is used as the weighting factor
